e.Facades

Class AdminFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • e.Facades.AdminFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CouponClientFacade

    public class AdminFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements CouponClientFacade
    A Facade which contains all methods that can be executed by the ADMIN. Any instance represents a single admin, that can execute the methods by this object, whose given by the login static method when correct parameters are given to it.
    This class implements CouponClientFacade. The Admin Facade is part of the Facades layer which enables the users to handle their information.
